description: Detects the attack technique pass the hash which is used to move laterally inside the network Author: Ilias el Matani (rule), The Information Assurance Directorate at the NSA (method). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Pass the Hash Activity
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:("4624" OR "4625") AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:"3" AND winlog.event_data.LogonProcessName:"NtLmSsp" AND source.domain:"%Workstations%" AND winlog.ComputerName:"%Workstations%") AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:"ANONYMOUS\ LOGON")))
